alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Collier, northwestern Hendry and southwestern Glades Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Labelle to near Orangetree. Movement was northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Golden Gate Estates, Ave Maria, Immokalee, Felda, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, Muse, Port La Belle, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
